text: Hagi ana kumakura amanage huno nasami'ne, Kefo avu'ava'ma hu'nesare'ma eri'za esaza ofane, kumi ofanema hanaza afu ame'a pristi vahe'mo'za amafi negre'za, witi ofanena kregahaze. Ruotge'ma hu'nea ofama eri'za megi'a mono kumapima vanage'zama vahe'ma zamazeri ruotge'ma huzankura amafi kregahaze.
